metadata.title: CVE-2020-13230 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, disabling a user account does not immediatelyinvalidate any permissions granted to that account (e.g., permission toview logs).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
